Package Question1

Class MatrixInversionStrategy

java.lang.Object
Question1.MatrixInversionStrategy
All Implemented Interfaces:
ILinearSolverStrategy
public class MatrixInversionStrategy
extends java.lang.Object
implements ILinearSolverStrategy
Implementation of matrix inversion strategy for solving linear equations.
Author:
Gokce Nur Erer

      Implementation of getting cofactors of an matrix with a given row and column
      Parameters:
      matrix - Matrix whose cofactors will be calculated
      givenRow - Row of the element the cofactor will be calculated
      givenColumn - Column of the element which cofactor will be calculated
      Returns:
      Cofactors of the given matrix

    • solve

      public double[] solve​(double[][] coefficents, double[] results)
      Solves an equation system with given coefficents and equation results.
      Specified by:
      solve in interface ILinearSolverStrategy
      Parameters:
      coefficents - Coefficents of the variables in the equations.

      Returns:
